## Reproduction attempt

For https://github.com/prisma/prisma/issues/21512

Make sure to have a database running and edit the `.env` file.

```sh
# Switch the Node.js version provided in `.nvmrc`
nvm install
nvm use 

node -v

yarn

docker compose up -d

yarn prisma db push

NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=200" yarn ts-node main.ts
```


### Results, from running on a Codespace (Ubuntu)
- Prisma `5.4.2`
- Node.js `v20.8.0`

Short analysis: no memory leak detected, rss and heap are stable over time.
